code: import React from'react';import certification1Image from'../assets/images/certification1.png';import certification2Image from'../assets/images/certification2.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Certifications(){const certifications=[{id:1,title:'Certification Title 1',organization:'Certification Organization 1',date:'Date 1',image:certification1Image},{id:2,title:'Certification Title 2',organization:'Certification Organization 2',date:'Date 2',image:certification2Image}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"certifications-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:certifications.map(certification=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:certification.image,className:"card-img-top",alt:certification.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:certification.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Organization: ",certification.organization]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Date: ",certification.date]})]})]})},certification.id))})})});}export default Certifications;
